title: LF> team members for silver 5 team
body:
IGN: Arrabbiata

Team name: Ruseav

This team is a casual team
- no flaming, we are here to have fun
- no blaming, we are here to learn
- play at LEAST once a week, we will aim to play more than once a week possibly 3-5 times hopefully.

Skype is a must!!!!  high tier bronze to plats preferred.

Please post:

-IGN
-Solo Q rank
-Best position
-Champion pool (in said position)

replies.body:
-IGN -  iTwistYourFate
-Solo Q rank - Silver III.
-Best position - Support
-Champion pool (in said position) - Janna, Morgana, Leona. However can additionally play other champions.

UnIucky (its uniucky if cant find it)

Bronze 1

Mainly Supp/Jungle/Top (mostly tanks)

Supp : Nautilus, Thresh, Leona, Braum, Alistar, Sona, Morgana, Vel'koz
Jungle : Amumu, Reksai, Gragas, Volibear
Top : Renekton, Maokai, Mundo,  Shen, GP, Jarvan, Riven(practicing)

I mostly available at night
guys, because there are many of you i will add you and build a second team.

ƒamous (I will add you)

Bronze 1

Mid lane, can adc/top though (HIGHLY pref mid lane)

Ahri (main), Orianna, Katarina, Diana, LeBlanc, Annie (bigger champion pool than listen but can't remember all + need to work on a few)

UrbanAngel

Silver 3 (was silver 1 yesterday but had a terrible day)

Main support, can jungle mid and adc tho

Janna, Leona, Lucian, Jinx, Brand, Lux, Amumu, Kayle

S5
JG but can pretty much fill apart from ADC
Don't have a set champion pool just kind of play a champ to fit what the team needs
